verses.verse: In that day <WH3117> shall this <WH2088> song <WH7892> be sung <WH7891> in the land <WH776> of Judah; <WH3063> We have a strong <WH5797> city; <WH5892> salvation <WH3444> will God appoint <WH7896> for walls <WH2346> and bulwarks. <WH2426>
Open <WH6605> you the gates, <WH8179> that the righteous <WH6662> nation <WH1471> which keeps <WH8104> the truth <WH529> may enter <WH935> in.
You will keep <WH5341> him in perfect peace, <WH7965> whose mind <WH3336> is stayed <WH5564> on you: because <WH3588> he trusts <WH982> in you.
Trust <WH982> you in the LORD <WH3068> for ever: <WH5703> for in the LORD <WH3050> JEHOVAH <WH3068> is everlasting <WH5769> strength: <WH6697>

For he brings <WH7817> down <WH7817> them that dwell <WH3427> on <WH4791> high; <WH4791> the lofty <WH7682> city, <WH7151> he lays it low; <WH8213> he lays it low, <WH8213> even to the ground; <WH776> he brings <WH5060> it even to the dust. <WH6083>
The foot <WH7272> shall tread <WH7429> it down, even the feet <WH7272> of the poor, <WH6041> and the steps <WH6471> of the needy. <WH1800>
The way <WH734> of the just <WH6662> is uprightness: <WH4339> you, most upright, <WH3477> do weigh <WH6424> the path <WH4570> of the just. <WH6662>

Yes, <WH637> in the way <WH734> of your judgments, <WH4941> O LORD, <WH3068> have we waited <WH6960> for you; the desire <WH8378> of our soul <WH5315> is to your name, <WH8034> and to the remembrance <WH2143> of you.

With my soul <WH5315> have I desired <WH183> you in the night; <WH3915> yes, <WH637> with my spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> me will I seek <WH7836> you early: <WH7836> for when <WH834> your judgments <WH4941> are in the earth, <WH776> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the world <WH8398> will learn <WH3925> righteousness. <WH6664>

Let favor <WH2603> be showed to the wicked, <WH7563> yet will he not learn <WH3925> righteousness: <WH6664> in the land <WH776> of uprightness <WH5229> will he deal unjustly, <WH5765> and will not behold <WH7200> the majesty <WH1348> of the LORD. <WH3068>

LORD, <WH3068> when your hand <WH3027> is lifted <WH7311> up, they will not see: <WH2372> but they shall see, <WH2372> and be ashamed <WH954> for their envy <WH7068> at the people; <WH5971> yes, <WH637> the fire <WH784> of your enemies <WH6862> shall devour <WH398> them.
LORD, <WH3068> you will ordain <WH8239> peace <WH7965> for us: for you also <WH1571> have worked <WH6466> all <WH3605> our works <WH4639> in us.
O LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> other lords <WH113> beside <WH2108> you have had dominion <WH1166> over us: but by you only <WH905> will we make mention <WH2142> of your name. <WH8034>

They are dead, <WH4191> they shall not live; <WH2421> they are deceased, <WH7496> they shall not rise: <WH6965> therefore <WH3651> have you visited <WH6485> and destroyed <WH8045> them, and made all <WH3605> their memory <WH2143> to perish. <WH6>

You have increased <WH3254> the nation, <WH1471> O LORD, <WH3068> you have increased <WH3254> the nation: <WH1471> you are glorified: <WH3513> you had removed <WH7368> it far <WH7368> to all <WH3605> the ends <WH7097> of the earth. <WH776>
LORD, <WH3068> in trouble <WH6862> have they visited <WH6485> you, they poured <WH6694> out a prayer <WH3908> when your chastening <WH4148> was on them.

Like <WH3644> as a woman with child, <WH2030> that draws near <WH7126> the time of her delivery, <WH3205> is in pain, <WH2342> and cries <WH2199> out in her pangs; <WH2256> so <WH3651> have we been <WH1961> in your sight, <WH6440> O LORD. <WH3068>

We have been with child, <WH2029> we have been in pain, <WH2342> we have as it were brought <WH3205> forth <WH3205> wind; <WH7307> we have not worked <WH6213> any deliverance <WH3444> in the earth; <WH776> neither <WH1077> have the inhabitants <WH3427> of the world <WH8398> fallen. <WH5307>

Your dead <WH4191> men shall live, <WH2421> together with my dead <WH5038> body <WH5038> shall they arise. <WH6965> Awake <WH6974> and sing, <WH7442> you that dwell <WH7931> in dust: <WH6083> for your dew <WH2919> is as the dew <WH2919> of herbs, <WH219> and the earth <WH776> shall cast <WH5307> out the dead. <WH7496>

Come, <WH3212> my people, <WH5971> enter <WH935> you into your chambers, <WH2315> and shut <WH5462> your doors <WH1817> about <WH1157> you: hide <WH2247> yourself as it were for a little <WH4592> moment, <WH7281> until <WH5704> the indignation <WH2195> be over. <WH5674>

For, behold, <WH2009> the LORD <WH3068> comes <WH3318> out of his place <WH4725> to punish <WH6485> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the earth <WH776> for their iniquity: <WH5771> the earth <WH776> also shall disclose <WH1540> her blood, <WH1818> and shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> cover <WH3680> her slain. <WH2026>
